message:
SYSTEM: 2022.10.AI4LABOUR.pdf: Página 4
AI4LABOUR Secondment
In my words
4
Build a portal where European citizens can check if 
their jobs are likely to be impacted by AI and to suggest 
them education and training so they can find a new job. 
To this aim, I created some scripts that generated 
datasets with the courses in Coursera, edX and 
Udemy, that will be eventually linked to different skills 
for different jobs and be suggested to the citizens.
“
”
speaker: SYSTEM
